description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability in CX-Programmer v9.76.1 and earlier which is a part of CX-One (v4.60) suite allows an attacker to cause information disclosure and/or arbitrary code execution by having a user to open a specially crafted CXP file.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: CX-Programmer v9.76.1 and earlier which is a part of CX-One (v4.60) suite
